headline: Basin rig count down two as prices soar
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was down two this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 242 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 303 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up two from last week at 546 rigs. A year ago, 582 rigs were active. The count shows that 411 rigs sought oil, unchanged from the previous week, and 125 explored for ...
